protocol.name: P-G9201-1
protocol.text: Plants were grown in soil at 22ËšC with a 16 h light : 8 h dark cycle.

protocol.name: P-G9201-2
protocol.text: Plants were treated with EtOH-vapour for 0 min, 90 min or 240 min.

protocol.name: P-G9201-3
protocol.text: Genechip Expression Analysis Technical Manual 701021 Rev. 5; Section 2, Chapter 1  Eukaryotic Target Preparation (2.1.3)

protocol.name: P-G9201-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the Qiagen RNeasy Plant Mini Kit according to the manufacturer's instructions. RNA was then treated with Ambion Turbo DNA-free Kit according to the manufacturer's instructions.
